title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: Traffic & Travel Tips
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Traffic & Travel Tips              Traffic & Travel Tips      Plane The nearest commerical airports are located in Montgomery, AL (65 miles), Birmingham, AL (85 miles) or Atlanta, GA (110 miles).   Motor Vehicle The park is located in east central Alabama on State Highway 49, 12 miles north of the town of Dadeville. Signs along U.S. Highway 280 and State Road 22 direct motorists to the park.
